text: can you give me useful docs

Morning folks, just looking at custom code actions. Few noobish questions on a snippet created by Jack C - Creating a note and associating it to a contact record.

Is this snippet drag and drop? As in, can I drop this into a custom code action and have it work? I don't see any definitions for object in workflow for example, guessing there is more to add here.

Also, I'd like to adept this for other object types, deal and tickets. Is it as simple as adjusting line 20 ~`Contact`~ -> `Deal`

`url: '<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/notes/>' + engagementID + '/associations/~contact~deal/' + event.object.objectId + '/NOTE_TO_~CONTACT~DEAL?hapikey=' + process.env.HAPIKEY,`

<https://gist.github.com/jackcoldrick90/03366967f400f23eb27c4d49b53177a6>
Hi everyone. Can I send an attachment to a company object via API?
<@UP452DA2Z> how to add attachment in note and add comment in particular note
Can we get these options documented? Some of the dropdown options are not in the list above the dropdown for <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/site-search|the site search api>
Also, is there a way to get a listing page without search?

I'm afraid I'm not the best person to ask here! I have very limited API knowledge when working with HS.

I know the documentation I linked to you shows how to make attachments in notes. I haven't seen anything relating to comments to a note however.
Hi everyone, could someone please assist, v2 has been integrated to functions.php, how would one integrate v3 into functions.php <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form>
I've got an API Integrations project that I'm looking for a freelance developer to come join in on - Let me know if anyone is interested!

Hi there, is anyone able to point me in the direction for how to get the amount of clicks, that the links within an email get, using the API? (Sorry for the confusing phrasing, I'm not sure how else to word it) I know it is shown through the HubSpot UI, but I'd like to find a way to get that data.

Hi, does anyone know if it possible to set up "Unique Pipeline ID" without generating this automatically by the HubSpot? I checked this and it is possible through the API, but it looks like it is not possible through HubSpot Interface. I want HubSpot users to create Pipeline that will be always detected within my app based on the unique ID however HubSpot give always different ID...

Or maybe it is possible to search Pipeline based on Pipeline name and not the id? Anyone have any thoughts?
You can search all pipelines and match it with the name you are looking for. Looping through those should be easy.

Hello Everyone,

I want to integrate the HubSpot API in the PHP is there any better document/SDK/Process to achieve this. I just want to add the customer information in HubSpot via PHP API
Can anyone help me out from this?

Thanks
How can I get the access token in HubSpot?
